menu.name: Margherita Pizza
menu.description: Classic Margherita pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, basil leaves, and tangy tomato sauce on a crispy thin crust..

menu.name: Chicken Burger
menu.description: Juicy grilled chicken burger with fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and special sauce.

menu.name: Caesar Salad
menu.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and creamy Caesar dressing with crunchy croutons.
